contents:
Android下载地址：
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.telegram.messenger
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.thunderdog.challegram

点击链接打开 Telegram 客户端更改语言:[url=https://congcong0806.github.io/2019/02/21/Telegram/#%E7%82%B9%E5%87%BB%E9%93%BE%E6%8E%A5%E6%89%93%E5%BC%80-telegram-%E5%AE%A2%E6%88%B7%E7%AB%AF%E6%9B%B4%E6%94%B9%E8%AF%AD%E8%A8%80][/url]
  • 英文:https://telegram/setlanguage/en
  • 简体中文:https://telegram/setlanguage/zh-hans-raw
  • 简体中文(聪聪):https://telegram/setlanguage/zhcncc
  • 简体中文(@zh_CN 版):https://telegram/setlanguage/classic-zh-cn
  • 简体中文(langCN):https://telegram/setlanguage/zhlangcn
  • 简体中文(瓜体):https://telegram/setlanguage/duang-zh-cn
  • 简体中文(小哇):https://telegram/setlanguage/qingwa
  • 喵体中文 （ @MiaoCN ）:https://telegram/setlanguage/meowcn
  • 繁体中文(香港):https://telegram/setlanguage/zh-hant-raw
  • 中文（香港）:https://telegram/setlanguage/hongkong
  • 台湾正体:https://telegram/setlanguage/taiwan
  • 郭桓桓的繁體中文語言包:https://telegram/setlanguage/zhong-taiwan-traditional
  • 文言:https://telegram/setlanguage/chinese-ancient
  • 日文:https://telegram/setlanguage/ja-beta
